subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The advice that Joe Girardi said he gave his new players on opening day was, “just be who you are.” If players heeded that advice, as Alex Rodriguez did, Yankees fans are in for a long season.
snippet: The advice that Joe Girardi said he gave his new players on opening day was, “just be who you are.” If players heeded that advice, as Alex Rodriguez did, Yankees fans are in for a long season.
